Interface that Service Discovery Plugins should implement

Author:
Dong Liu (Knowledge Media Institute - The Open University), Carlos Pedrinaci (Knowledge Media Institute - The Open University)

getDescription, getFeedTitle, getName, getParametersDetails, getVersion
 

Method Detail

discoverServices

Map<URL,MatchResult> discoverServices(javax.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,String> parameters)
                                      throws DiscoveryException
Discover matching services based on the key-value pairs providing values for the plugin discovery parameters. The results are indexed by the URL of the matching result in order to better support merging results

Parameters:
parameters - the invocation parameters for the discovery plugin. These parameters are plugin dependent DiscoveryPlugin
Returns:
the matching results not necessarily ordered. The ordering shall take place at a later stage prior to returning the results.
Throws:
DiscoveryException
